item.description:
Bring raw vegan organic dish or produce
or pre-order a dinner by calling ahead at
978-702-9418

DIRECTIONS:
From South via 93N, 495N, & 110E:
93N, 495N, Exit 53 (Merrimac), (L) Broad St, (R) 110E Main St, (L) Bear Hill Rd, (R) Lanes Ten Acres Rd, (L) Shore Rd (2nd house on right #5)

From South via 95N, 110W, 495S, & 110E:
95N, Exit 58B (110W Amesbury), 110 W, (R) 495S, Exit 53 (Merrimac), (R) Broad St, (R) 110E Main St, (R) Bear Hill Rd, (R) Lanes Ten Acres Rd, (L) Shore Rd (2nd house on right #5)

From North via 93S, 213E, 495N, & 110E:
93S, 213E, 495N, Exit 53 (Merrimac), (L) Broad St, (R) 110E Main St, (L) Bear Hill Rd, (R) Lanes Ten Acres Rd, (L) Shore Rd (2nd house on right #5)

From North via 95S, 495S, & 110E:
95S, 495S, Exit 53 (Merrimac), (R) Broad St, (R) 110E Main St, (R) Bear Hill Rd, (R) Lanes Ten Acres Rd, (L) Shore Rd (2nd house on right #5)

(R=Right, L=Left)

Bus: www.mvrta.com
Train: www.mbta.com
item.name: Raw Vegan ThanksLiving Potluck/Dinner
